post.title: home assisant weifhu
post.excerpt: Clean up the Cache and Obsolete Files
post.content:
You must recreate Python virtual environment after OS update from debain 9 to debain 11

Installation methods

Python virtual environment + Home Assistant Core

 

you must recreate Python virtual environment

 

sudo useradd -rm homeassistant -G dialout,gpio,i2c
sudo chown homeassistant:homeassistant /srv/homeassistant

sudo -u homeassistant -H -s
cd /srv/homeassistant
python3.9 -m venv .
source bin/activate

 

 

 

Clean up the Cache and Obsolete Files

sudo apt autoremove
sudo apt clean

 

disable pi wifi

echo "dtoverlay=pi3-disable-wifi" | sudo tee -a /boot/config.txt

 

# dmesg
